sentences.english: Siberians are the most endangered of all cranes.

sentences.english: In Chinese culture , white crane bears a symbol of elegance , nobleness as well as long life.
sentences.chinese: 在中國文化裏，白鶴是優雅，高貴，長壽的象徵。

sentences.english: The crane stood grave and still in the swamp near the mango grove.

sentences.english: The population of Siberian cranes in Poyang Lake will also be affected by the dam.
